description: '''Natalie R. Lu''' (born August 6, 2004), known professionally as '''Wisp''', is an American [[shoegaze]] musician. She began releasing music in 2023 and released her debut EP, [[Pandora (Wisp EP)|''Pandora'']], in April the following year. A track from the album, "[[Your Face (song)|Your Face]]", went viral on [[TikTok]] and charted on ''[[Billboard (magazine)|Billboard]]''<nowiki/>'s [[Hot Hard Rock Songs]].
